findings.title: Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25% by calling the setTransactionFee function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.

findings.title: Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: The are variables that are defined in the local scope containing the same name from an upper scope.
